solution_line_template: From September to February, Sam made {sept_to_feb_hours}hrs x ${hourly_rate}/hr = $<<{sept_to_feb_hours}*{hourly_rate}={sept_to_feb_earnings}>>{sept_to_feb_earnings}.
From March to February, Sam made a total of ${march_to_august_earnings} + ${sept_to_feb_earnings} = ${total_earnings}.
After fixing his car, he was left with ${total_earnings} - ${car_repair_cost} = $<<{total_earnings}-{car_repair_cost}={remaining_money}>>{remaining_money}.
Sam needs to work another ${money_needed} / ${hourly_rate}/hr = <<{money_needed}/{hourly_rate}={additional_hours_needed}>>{additional_hours_needed} hours.
